description: Try our easy to follow Veggie Patch Burger With Secret Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Summer
name: Veggie Patch Burger With Secret Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp dried flaked onion (for secret sauce)
2 tbs thousand island dressing (for secret sauce)
1 tbs green tomato relish (for secret sauce)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the flat grill side of a barbecue to high.
Brush the veggie patty with oil and season with salt and pepper. Cook on heated grill for 3-4 minutes, then flip and cook for a further 3-4 minutes or until well coloured.
Meanwhile, to make the secret sauce, combine sauce ingredients in a small bowl and set aside.
Toast cut halves of the brioche bun on the flat grill side of the barbecue for 1 minute or until toasted. Place cheese on the veggie patty and allow to melt slightly.
Place cooked veggie patty and cheese on bottom brioche half. Assemble burger with lettuce and tomato. Drizzle with secret sauce. Place remaining brioche half on top and serve.
